name: Maze Escaper
description:
This is my capstone project for the MSU's Videogame Design and Development.

The goal is the following:

- Start the game. A maze will be generated randomly.

- Find the rotating password tube somewhere (random) in the maze. DO NOT LOSE THE PASSWORD, IT'S YOUR ONLY CHANCE TO HAVE IT.

- Input the password in the exit.

- You can play infinitely to improve your timing.

Cheers,

Diego Faria (Efu-Dev).
